short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically count the cards for you in Trix, Tarneeb, etc...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Card Counter Extension for Jawaker

Take your Jawaker game to the next level with the Card Counter Extension! This tool automatically tracks and displays all the cards that have been played during the game, giving you a clear and organized view of each suit or symbol. The cards are neatly arranged in stacks along the sides of the table, allowing you to strategize more effectively and keep a close eye on the game’s progression.

In case the card stacks do not reset automatically, simply click the "Reset Cards" button located at the bottom left corner of the table to start fresh. With this extension, you’ll have a streamlined and enhanced Jawaker gaming experience, making it easier than ever to track the game and outsmart your opponents.
